title: "Unspecified Error"
body: Hello, I have this problem in loading patches 6.18. I was able to load patches last week, but this week..It wouldn't cooperate with me. I have no corrupted or missing files..I just don't know how to fix this "Unspecified Error" thing. Please help!!

replies.body:
Unspecified errors during the patching process can be caused by a number of different factors, it really depends on at what % the patching fails. We've consolidated the most common solutions in our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), so I recommend working through those steps.

Let me know if they yielded any change in your ability to patch.
Hello, I just fixed it on Sunday, 9/18. Thanks though! I deleted the LoL Projects file and just had to wait a bit for League to update.
